00070 static int ffmpeg_audio_codec = CODEC_ID_NONE;

00098 /* Delete a picture buffer */
00099 
00100 static void delete_picture(AVFrame* f)
00101 {
00102     if (f) {
00103         if (f->data[0]) MEM_freeN(f->data[0]);
00104         av_free(f);
00105     }
00106 }

00108 #ifdef WITH_AUDASPACE
00109 static int write_audio_frame(void) 
00110 {
00111     AVCodecContext* c = NULL;
00112     AVPacket pkt;
00113 
00114     c = audio_stream->codec;
00115 
00116     av_init_packet(&pkt);
00117     pkt.size = 0;
00118 
00119     AUD_readDevice(audio_mixdown_device, audio_input_buffer, audio_input_samples);
00120     audio_time += (double) audio_input_samples / (double) c->sample_rate;
00121 
00122     pkt.size = avcodec_encode_audio(c, audio_output_buffer,
00123                     audio_outbuf_size,
00124                     (short*) audio_input_buffer);
00125 
00126     if (pkt.size < 0)
00127     {
00128         // XXX error("Error writing audio packet");
00129         return -1;
00130     }
00131 
00132     pkt.data = audio_output_buffer;
00133 
00134     if (c->coded_frame && c->coded_frame->pts != AV_NOPTS_VALUE)
00135     {
00136         pkt.pts = av_rescale_q(c->coded_frame->pts,
00137                        c->time_base, audio_stream->time_base);
00138         fprintf(stderr, "Audio Frame PTS: %d\n", (int)pkt.pts);
00139     }
00140 
00141     pkt.stream_index = audio_stream->index;
00142 
00143     pkt.flags |= AV_PKT_FLAG_KEY;
00144 
00145     if (av_interleaved_write_frame(outfile, &pkt) != 0) {
00146         fprintf(stderr, "Error writing audio packet!\n");
00147         return -1;
00148     }
00149     return 0;
00150 }
00151 #endif // #ifdef WITH_AUDASPACE

00153 /* Allocate a temporary frame */
00154 static AVFrame* alloc_picture(int pix_fmt, int width, int height) 
00155 {
00156     AVFrame* f;
00157     uint8_t* buf;
00158     int size;
00159     
00160     /* allocate space for the struct */
00161     f = avcodec_alloc_frame();
00162     if (!f) return NULL;
00163     size = avpicture_get_size(pix_fmt, width, height);
00164     /* allocate the actual picture buffer */
00165     buf = MEM_mallocN(size, "AVFrame buffer");
00166     if (!buf) {
00167         free(f);
00168         return NULL;
00169     }
00170     avpicture_fill((AVPicture*)f, buf, pix_fmt, width, height);
00171     return f;
00172 }

00174 /* Get the correct file extensions for the requested format,
00175  * first is always desired guess_format parameter */
00176 static const char** get_file_extensions(int format) 
00177 {
00178     switch(format) {
00179     case FFMPEG_DV: {
00180         static const char * rv[] = { ".dv", NULL };
00181         return rv;
00182     }
00183     case FFMPEG_MPEG1: {
00184         static const char * rv[] = { ".mpg", ".mpeg", NULL };
00185         return rv;
00186     }
00187     case FFMPEG_MPEG2: {
00188         static const char * rv[] = { ".dvd", ".vob", ".mpg", ".mpeg",
00189                          NULL };
00190         return rv;
00191     }
00192     case FFMPEG_MPEG4: {
00193         static const char * rv[] = { ".mp4", ".mpg", ".mpeg", NULL };
00194         return rv;
00195     }
00196     case FFMPEG_AVI: {
00197         static const char * rv[] = { ".avi", NULL };
00198         return rv;
00199     }
00200     case FFMPEG_MOV: {
00201         static const char * rv[] = { ".mov", NULL };
00202         return rv;
00203     }
00204     case FFMPEG_H264: {
00205         /* FIXME: avi for now... */
00206         static const char * rv[] = { ".avi", NULL };
00207         return rv;
00208     }
00209 
00210     case FFMPEG_XVID: {
00211         /* FIXME: avi for now... */
00212         static const char * rv[] = { ".avi", NULL };
00213         return rv;
00214     }
00215     case FFMPEG_FLV: {
00216         static const char * rv[] = { ".flv", NULL };
00217         return rv;
00218     }
00219     case FFMPEG_MKV: {
00220         static const char * rv[] = { ".mkv", NULL };
00221         return rv;
00222     }
00223     case FFMPEG_OGG: {
00224         static const char * rv[] = { ".ogg", ".ogv", NULL };
00225         return rv;
00226     }
00227     case FFMPEG_MP3: {
00228         static const char * rv[] = { ".mp3", NULL };
00229         return rv;
00230     }
00231     case FFMPEG_WAV: {
00232         static const char * rv[] = { ".wav", NULL };
00233         return rv;
00234     }
00235     default:
00236         return NULL;
00237     }
00238 }

00240 /* Write a frame to the output file */
00241 static int write_video_frame(RenderData *rd, int cfra, AVFrame* frame, ReportList *reports)
00242 {
00243     int outsize = 0;
00244     int ret, success= 1;
00245     AVCodecContext* c = video_stream->codec;
00246 
00247     frame->pts = cfra;
00248 
00249     if (rd->mode & R_FIELDS) {
00250         frame->top_field_first = ((rd->mode & R_ODDFIELD) != 0);
00251     }
00252 
00253     outsize = avcodec_encode_video(c, video_buffer, video_buffersize, 
00254                        frame);
00255 
00256     if (outsize > 0) {
00257         AVPacket packet;
00258         av_init_packet(&packet);
00259 
00260         if (c->coded_frame->pts != AV_NOPTS_VALUE) {
00261             packet.pts = av_rescale_q(c->coded_frame->pts,
00262                           c->time_base,
00263                           video_stream->time_base);
00264             fprintf(stderr, "Video Frame PTS: %d\n", (int)packet.pts);
00265         }
00266         else {
00267             fprintf(stderr, "Video Frame PTS: not set\n");
00268         }
00269         if (c->coded_frame->key_frame)
00270             packet.flags |= AV_PKT_FLAG_KEY;
00271         packet.stream_index = video_stream->index;
00272         packet.data = video_buffer;
00273         packet.size = outsize;
00274         ret = av_interleaved_write_frame(outfile, &packet);
00275         success = (ret == 0);
00276     }
00277     else if (outsize < 0) {
00278         success = 0;
00279     }
00280 
00281     if (!success)
00282         BKE_report(reports, RPT_ERROR, "Error writing frame.");
00283 
00284     return success;
00285 }
00286 
00287 /* read and encode a frame of audio from the buffer */
00288 static AVFrame* generate_video_frame(uint8_t* pixels, ReportList *reports) 
00289 {
00290     uint8_t* rendered_frame;
00291 
00292     AVCodecContext* c = video_stream->codec;
00293     int width = c->width;
00294     int height = c->height;
00295     AVFrame* rgb_frame;
00296 
00297     if (c->pix_fmt != PIX_FMT_BGR32) {
00298         rgb_frame = alloc_picture(PIX_FMT_BGR32, width, height);
00299         if (!rgb_frame) {
00300             BKE_report(reports, RPT_ERROR, "Couldn't allocate temporary frame.");
00301             return NULL;
00302         }
00303     }
00304     else {
00305         rgb_frame = current_frame;
00306     }
00307 
00308     rendered_frame = pixels;
00309 
00310     /* Do RGBA-conversion and flipping in one step depending
00311      * on CPU-Endianess */
00312 
00313     if (ENDIAN_ORDER == L_ENDIAN) {
00314         int y;
00315         for (y = 0; y < height; y++) {
00316             uint8_t* target = rgb_frame->data[0]
00317                 + width * 4 * (height - y - 1);
00318             uint8_t* src = rendered_frame + width * 4 * y;
00319             uint8_t* end = src + width * 4;
00320             while (src != end) {
00321                 target[3] = src[3];
00322                 target[2] = src[2];
00323                 target[1] = src[1];
00324                 target[0] = src[0];
00325 
00326                 target += 4;
00327                 src += 4;
00328             }
00329         }
00330     }
00331     else {
00332         int y;
00333         for (y = 0; y < height; y++) {
00334             uint8_t* target = rgb_frame->data[0]
00335                 + width * 4 * (height - y - 1);
00336             uint8_t* src = rendered_frame + width * 4 * y;
00337             uint8_t* end = src + width * 4;
00338             while (src != end) {
00339                 target[3] = src[0];
00340                 target[2] = src[1];
00341                 target[1] = src[2];
00342                 target[0] = src[3];
00343 
00344                 target += 4;
00345                 src += 4;
00346             }
00347         }
00348     }
00349 
00350     if (c->pix_fmt != PIX_FMT_BGR32) {
00351         sws_scale(img_convert_ctx, (const uint8_t * const*) rgb_frame->data,
00352                   rgb_frame->linesize, 0, c->height,
00353                   current_frame->data, current_frame->linesize);
00354         delete_picture(rgb_frame);
00355     }
00356     return current_frame;
00357 }
00358 
00359 static void set_ffmpeg_property_option(AVCodecContext* c, IDProperty * prop)
00360 {
00361     char name[128];
00362     char * param;
00363     const AVOption * rv = NULL;
00364 
00365     fprintf(stderr, "FFMPEG expert option: %s: ", prop->name);
00366 
00367     BLI_strncpy(name, prop->name, sizeof(name));
00368 
00369     param = strchr(name, ':');
00370 
00371     if (param) {
00372         *param++ = 0;
00373     }
00374 
00375     switch(prop->type) {
00376     case IDP_STRING:
00377         fprintf(stderr, "%s.\n", IDP_String(prop));
00378         av_set_string3(c, prop->name, IDP_String(prop), 1, &rv);
00379         break;
00380     case IDP_FLOAT:
00381         fprintf(stderr, "%g.\n", IDP_Float(prop));
00382         rv = av_set_double(c, prop->name, IDP_Float(prop));
00383         break;
00384     case IDP_INT:
00385         fprintf(stderr, "%d.\n", IDP_Int(prop));
00386         
00387         if (param) {
00388             if (IDP_Int(prop)) {
00389                 av_set_string3(c, name, param, 1, &rv);
00390             }
00391             else {
00392                 return;
00393             }
00394         }
00395         else {
00396             rv = av_set_int(c, prop->name, IDP_Int(prop));
00397         }
00398         break;
00399     }
00400 
00401     if (!rv) {
00402         fprintf(stderr, "ffmpeg-option not supported: %s! Skipping.\n",
00403             prop->name);
00404     }
00405 }
00406 
00407 static int ffmpeg_proprty_valid(AVCodecContext *c, const char *prop_name, IDProperty *curr)
00408 {
00409     int valid= 1;
00410 
00411     if (strcmp(prop_name, "video")==0) {
00412         if (strcmp(curr->name, "bf")==0) {
00413             /* flash codec doesn't support b frames */
00414             valid&= c->codec_id!=CODEC_ID_FLV1;
00415         }
00416     }
00417 
00418     return valid;
00419 }
00420 
00421 static void set_ffmpeg_properties(RenderData *rd, AVCodecContext *c, const char * prop_name)
00422 {
00423     IDProperty * prop;
00424     void * iter;
00425     IDProperty * curr;
00426 
00427     if (!rd->ffcodecdata.properties) {
00428         return;
00429     }
00430     
00431     prop = IDP_GetPropertyFromGroup(rd->ffcodecdata.properties, prop_name);
00432     if (!prop) {
00433         return;
00434     }
00435 
00436     iter = IDP_GetGroupIterator(prop);
00437 
00438     while ((curr = IDP_GroupIterNext(iter)) != NULL) {
00439         if (ffmpeg_proprty_valid(c, prop_name, curr))
00440             set_ffmpeg_property_option(c, curr);
00441     }
00442 }
00443 
00444 /* prepare a video stream for the output file */
00445 
00446 static AVStream* alloc_video_stream(RenderData *rd, int codec_id, AVFormatContext* of,
00447                     int rectx, int recty) 
00448 {
00449     AVStream* st;
00450     AVCodecContext* c;
00451     AVCodec* codec;
00452     st = av_new_stream(of, 0);
00453     if (!st) return NULL;
00454 
00455     /* Set up the codec context */
00456     
00457     c = st->codec;
00458     c->codec_id = codec_id;
00459     c->codec_type = AVMEDIA_TYPE_VIDEO;
00460 
00461 
00462     /* Get some values from the current render settings */
00463     
00464     c->width = rectx;
00465     c->height = recty;
00466 
00467     /* FIXME: Really bad hack (tm) for NTSC support */
00468     if (ffmpeg_type == FFMPEG_DV && rd->frs_sec != 25) {
00469         c->time_base.den = 2997;
00470         c->time_base.num = 100;
00471     }
00472     else if ((double) ((int) rd->frs_sec_base) ==
00473            rd->frs_sec_base) {
00474         c->time_base.den = rd->frs_sec;
00475         c->time_base.num = (int) rd->frs_sec_base;
00476     }
00477     else {
00478         c->time_base.den = rd->frs_sec * 100000;
00479         c->time_base.num = ((double) rd->frs_sec_base) * 100000;
00480     }
00481     
00482     c->gop_size = ffmpeg_gop_size;
00483     c->bit_rate = ffmpeg_video_bitrate*1000;
00484     c->rc_max_rate = rd->ffcodecdata.rc_max_rate*1000;
00485     c->rc_min_rate = rd->ffcodecdata.rc_min_rate*1000;
00486     c->rc_buffer_size = rd->ffcodecdata.rc_buffer_size * 1024;
00487     c->rc_initial_buffer_occupancy 
00488         = rd->ffcodecdata.rc_buffer_size*3/4;
00489     c->rc_buffer_aggressivity = 1.0;
00490     c->me_method = ME_EPZS;
00491     
00492     codec = avcodec_find_encoder(c->codec_id);
00493     if (!codec) return NULL;
00494     
00495     /* Be sure to use the correct pixel format(e.g. RGB, YUV) */
00496 
00497     if (codec->pix_fmts) {
00498         c->pix_fmt = codec->pix_fmts[0];
00499     }
00500     else {
00501         /* makes HuffYUV happy ... */
00502         c->pix_fmt = PIX_FMT_YUV422P;
00503     }
00504 
00505     if (ffmpeg_type == FFMPEG_XVID) {
00506         /* arghhhh ... */
00507         c->pix_fmt = PIX_FMT_YUV420P;
00508         c->codec_tag = (('D'<<24) + ('I'<<16) + ('V'<<8) + 'X');
00509     }
00510 
00511     if (codec_id == CODEC_ID_H264) {
00512         /* correct wrong default ffmpeg param which crash x264 */
00513         c->qmin=10;
00514         c->qmax=51;
00515     }
00516     
00517     // Keep lossless encodes in the RGB domain.
00518     if (codec_id == CODEC_ID_HUFFYUV) {
00519         /* HUFFYUV was PIX_FMT_YUV422P before */
00520         c->pix_fmt = PIX_FMT_RGB32;
00521     }
00522 
00523     if (codec_id == CODEC_ID_FFV1) {
00524 #ifdef FFMPEG_FFV1_ALPHA_SUPPORTED
00525         if (rd->im_format.planes ==  R_IMF_PLANES_RGBA) {
00526             c->pix_fmt = PIX_FMT_RGB32;
00527         }
00528         else {
00529             c->pix_fmt = PIX_FMT_BGR0;
00530         }
00531 #else
00532         c->pix_fmt = PIX_FMT_RGB32;
00533 #endif
00534     }
00535 
00536     if (codec_id == CODEC_ID_QTRLE ) {
00537         if (rd->im_format.planes ==  R_IMF_PLANES_RGBA) {
00538             c->pix_fmt = PIX_FMT_ARGB;
00539         }
00540     }
00541 
00542     if ((of->oformat->flags & AVFMT_GLOBALHEADER)
00543 //      || !strcmp(of->oformat->name, "mp4")
00544 //      || !strcmp(of->oformat->name, "mov")
00545 //      || !strcmp(of->oformat->name, "3gp")
00546         ) {
00547         fprintf(stderr, "Using global header\n");
00548         c->flags |= CODEC_FLAG_GLOBAL_HEADER;
00549     }
00550     
00551     /* Determine whether we are encoding interlaced material or not */
00552     if (rd->mode & R_FIELDS) {
00553         fprintf(stderr, "Encoding interlaced video\n");
00554         c->flags |= CODEC_FLAG_INTERLACED_DCT;
00555         c->flags |= CODEC_FLAG_INTERLACED_ME;
00556     }
00557 
00558     /* xasp & yasp got float lately... */
00559 
00560     st->sample_aspect_ratio = c->sample_aspect_ratio = av_d2q(
00561         ((double) rd->xasp / (double) rd->yasp), 255);
00562 
00563     set_ffmpeg_properties(rd, c, "video");
00564     
00565     if (avcodec_open(c, codec) < 0) {
00566         //
00567         //XXX error("Couldn't initialize codec");
00568         return NULL;
00569     }
00570 
00571     if ( codec_id == CODEC_ID_QTRLE ) {
00572         // normally it should be enough to have buffer with actual image size,
00573         // but some codecs like QTRLE might store extra information in this buffer,
00574         // so it should be a way larger
00575 
00576         // maximum video buffer size is 6-bytes per pixel, plus DPX header size (1664)
00577         // (from FFmpeg sources)
00578         int size = c->width * c->height;
00579         video_buffersize = 7*size + 10000;
00580     }
00581     else
00582         video_buffersize = avpicture_get_size(c->pix_fmt, c->width, c->height);
00583 
00584     video_buffer = (uint8_t*)MEM_mallocN(video_buffersize*sizeof(uint8_t),
00585                          "FFMPEG video buffer");
00586     
00587     current_frame = alloc_picture(c->pix_fmt, c->width, c->height);
00588 
00589     img_convert_ctx = sws_getContext(c->width, c->height,
00590                      PIX_FMT_BGR32,
00591                      c->width, c->height,
00592                      c->pix_fmt,
00593                      SWS_BICUBIC,
00594                      NULL, NULL, NULL);
00595     return st;
00596 }
00597 
00598 /* Prepare an audio stream for the output file */
00599 
00600 static AVStream* alloc_audio_stream(RenderData *rd, int codec_id, AVFormatContext* of) 
00601 {
00602     AVStream* st;
00603     AVCodecContext* c;
00604     AVCodec* codec;
00605 
00606     st = av_new_stream(of, 1);
00607     if (!st) return NULL;
00608 
00609     c = st->codec;
00610     c->codec_id = codec_id;
00611     c->codec_type = AVMEDIA_TYPE_AUDIO;
00612 
00613     c->sample_rate = rd->ffcodecdata.audio_mixrate;
00614     c->bit_rate = ffmpeg_audio_bitrate*1000;
00615     c->sample_fmt = SAMPLE_FMT_S16;
00616     c->channels = rd->ffcodecdata.audio_channels;
00617     codec = avcodec_find_encoder(c->codec_id);
00618     if (!codec) {
00619         //XXX error("Couldn't find a valid audio codec");
00620         return NULL;
00621     }
00622 
00623     set_ffmpeg_properties(rd, c, "audio");
00624 
00625     if (avcodec_open(c, codec) < 0) {
00626         //XXX error("Couldn't initialize audio codec");
00627         return NULL;
00628     }
00629 
00630     /* need to prevent floating point exception when using vorbis audio codec,
00631      * initialize this value in the same way as it's done in FFmpeg iteslf (sergey) */
00632     st->codec->time_base.num= 1;
00633     st->codec->time_base.den= st->codec->sample_rate;
00634 
00635     audio_outbuf_size = FF_MIN_BUFFER_SIZE;
00636 
00637     if ((c->codec_id >= CODEC_ID_PCM_S16LE) && (c->codec_id <= CODEC_ID_PCM_DVD))
00638         audio_input_samples = audio_outbuf_size * 8 / c->bits_per_coded_sample / c->channels;
00639     else {
00640         audio_input_samples = c->frame_size;
00641         if (c->frame_size * c->channels * sizeof(int16_t) * 4 > audio_outbuf_size)
00642             audio_outbuf_size = c->frame_size * c->channels * sizeof(int16_t) * 4;
00643     }
00644 
00645     audio_output_buffer = (uint8_t*)av_malloc(
00646         audio_outbuf_size);
00647 
00648     audio_input_buffer = (uint8_t*)av_malloc(
00649         audio_input_samples * c->channels * sizeof(int16_t));
00650 
00651     audio_time = 0.0f;
00652 
00653     return st;
00654 }
00655 /* essential functions -- start, append, end */
00656 
00657 static int start_ffmpeg_impl(struct RenderData *rd, int rectx, int recty, ReportList *reports)
00658 {
00659     /* Handle to the output file */
00660     AVFormatContext* of;
00661     AVOutputFormat* fmt;
00662     char name[256];
00663     const char ** exts;
00664 
00665     ffmpeg_type = rd->ffcodecdata.type;
00666     ffmpeg_codec = rd->ffcodecdata.codec;
00667     ffmpeg_audio_codec = rd->ffcodecdata.audio_codec;
00668     ffmpeg_video_bitrate = rd->ffcodecdata.video_bitrate;
00669     ffmpeg_audio_bitrate = rd->ffcodecdata.audio_bitrate;
00670     ffmpeg_gop_size = rd->ffcodecdata.gop_size;
00671     ffmpeg_autosplit = rd->ffcodecdata.flags
00672         & FFMPEG_AUTOSPLIT_OUTPUT;
00673     
00674     do_init_ffmpeg();
00675 
00676     /* Determine the correct filename */
00677     filepath_ffmpeg(name, rd);
00678     fprintf(stderr, "Starting output to %s(ffmpeg)...\n"
00679         "  Using type=%d, codec=%d, audio_codec=%d,\n"
00680         "  video_bitrate=%d, audio_bitrate=%d,\n"
00681         "  gop_size=%d, autosplit=%d\n"
00682         "  render width=%d, render height=%d\n", 
00683         name, ffmpeg_type, ffmpeg_codec, ffmpeg_audio_codec,
00684         ffmpeg_video_bitrate, ffmpeg_audio_bitrate,
00685         ffmpeg_gop_size, ffmpeg_autosplit, rectx, recty);
00686     
00687     exts = get_file_extensions(ffmpeg_type);
00688     if (!exts) {
00689         BKE_report(reports, RPT_ERROR, "No valid formats found.");
00690         return 0;
00691     }
00692     fmt = av_guess_format(NULL, exts[0], NULL);
00693     if (!fmt) {
00694         BKE_report(reports, RPT_ERROR, "No valid formats found.");
00695         return 0;
00696     }
00697 
00698     of = avformat_alloc_context();
00699     if (!of) {
00700         BKE_report(reports, RPT_ERROR, "Error opening output file");
00701         return 0;
00702     }
00703     
00704     of->oformat = fmt;
00705     of->packet_size= rd->ffcodecdata.mux_packet_size;
00706     if (ffmpeg_audio_codec != CODEC_ID_NONE) {
00707         of->mux_rate = rd->ffcodecdata.mux_rate;
00708     }
00709     else {
00710         of->mux_rate = 0;
00711     }
00712 
00713     of->preload = (int)(0.5*AV_TIME_BASE);
00714     of->max_delay = (int)(0.7*AV_TIME_BASE);
00715 
00716     fmt->audio_codec = ffmpeg_audio_codec;
00717 
00718     BLI_snprintf(of->filename, sizeof(of->filename), "%s", name);
00719     /* set the codec to the user's selection */
00720     switch(ffmpeg_type) {
00721     case FFMPEG_AVI:
00722     case FFMPEG_MOV:
00723     case FFMPEG_MKV:
00724         fmt->video_codec = ffmpeg_codec;
00725         break;
00726     case FFMPEG_OGG:
00727         fmt->video_codec = CODEC_ID_THEORA;
00728         break;
00729     case FFMPEG_DV:
00730         fmt->video_codec = CODEC_ID_DVVIDEO;
00731         break;
00732     case FFMPEG_MPEG1:
00733         fmt->video_codec = CODEC_ID_MPEG1VIDEO;
00734         break;
00735     case FFMPEG_MPEG2:
00736         fmt->video_codec = CODEC_ID_MPEG2VIDEO;
00737         break;
00738     case FFMPEG_H264:
00739         fmt->video_codec = CODEC_ID_H264;
00740         break;
00741     case FFMPEG_XVID:
00742         fmt->video_codec = CODEC_ID_MPEG4;
00743         break;
00744     case FFMPEG_FLV:
00745         fmt->video_codec = CODEC_ID_FLV1;
00746         break;
00747     case FFMPEG_MP3:
00748         fmt->audio_codec = CODEC_ID_MP3;
00749     case FFMPEG_WAV:
00750         fmt->video_codec = CODEC_ID_NONE;
00751         break;
00752     case FFMPEG_MPEG4:
00753     default:
00754         fmt->video_codec = CODEC_ID_MPEG4;
00755         break;
00756     }
00757     if (fmt->video_codec == CODEC_ID_DVVIDEO) {
00758         if (rectx != 720) {
00759             BKE_report(reports, RPT_ERROR, "Render width has to be 720 pixels for DV!");
00760             return 0;
00761         }
00762         if (rd->frs_sec != 25 && recty != 480) {
00763             BKE_report(reports, RPT_ERROR, "Render height has to be 480 pixels for DV-NTSC!");
00764             return 0;
00765         }
00766         if (rd->frs_sec == 25 && recty != 576) {
00767             BKE_report(reports, RPT_ERROR, "Render height has to be 576 pixels for DV-PAL!");
00768             return 0;
00769         }
00770     }
00771     
00772     if (ffmpeg_type == FFMPEG_DV) {
00773         fmt->audio_codec = CODEC_ID_PCM_S16LE;
00774         if (ffmpeg_audio_codec != CODEC_ID_NONE && rd->ffcodecdata.audio_mixrate != 48000 && rd->ffcodecdata.audio_channels != 2) {
00775             BKE_report(reports, RPT_ERROR, "FFMPEG only supports 48khz / stereo audio for DV!");
00776             return 0;
00777         }
00778     }
00779     
00780     if (fmt->video_codec != CODEC_ID_NONE) {
00781         video_stream = alloc_video_stream(rd, fmt->video_codec, of, rectx, recty);
00782         printf("alloc video stream %p\n", video_stream);
00783         if (!video_stream) {
00784             BKE_report(reports, RPT_ERROR, "Error initializing video stream.");
00785             return 0;
00786         }
00787     }
00788 
00789     if (ffmpeg_audio_codec != CODEC_ID_NONE) {
00790         audio_stream = alloc_audio_stream(rd, fmt->audio_codec, of);
00791         if (!audio_stream) {
00792             BKE_report(reports, RPT_ERROR, "Error initializing audio stream.");
00793             return 0;
00794         }
00795     }
00796     if (av_set_parameters(of, NULL) < 0) {
00797         BKE_report(reports, RPT_ERROR, "Error setting output parameters.");
00798         return 0;
00799     }
00800     if (!(fmt->flags & AVFMT_NOFILE)) {
00801         if (avio_open(&of->pb, name, AVIO_FLAG_WRITE) < 0) {
00802             BKE_report(reports, RPT_ERROR, "Could not open file for writing.");
00803             return 0;
00804         }
00805     }
00806 
00807     if (av_write_header(of) < 0) {
00808         BKE_report(reports, RPT_ERROR, "Could not initialize streams. Probably unsupported codec combination.");
00809         return 0;
00810     }
00811 
00812     outfile = of;
00813     av_dump_format(of, 0, name, 1);
00814 
00815     return 1;
00816 }
00817 
00835 void flush_ffmpeg(void)
00836 {
00837     int outsize = 0;
00838     int ret = 0;
00839     
00840     AVCodecContext* c = video_stream->codec;
00841     /* get the delayed frames */
00842     while (1) {
00843         AVPacket packet;
00844         av_init_packet(&packet);
00845         
00846         outsize = avcodec_encode_video(c, video_buffer, video_buffersize, NULL);
00847         if (outsize < 0) {
00848             fprintf(stderr, "Error encoding delayed frame %d\n", outsize);
00849             break;
00850         }
00851         if (outsize == 0) {
00852             break;
00853         }
00854         if (c->coded_frame->pts != AV_NOPTS_VALUE) {
00855             packet.pts = av_rescale_q(c->coded_frame->pts,
00856                           c->time_base,
00857                           video_stream->time_base);
00858             fprintf(stderr, "Video Frame PTS: %d\n", (int)packet.pts);
00859         }
00860         else {
00861             fprintf(stderr, "Video Frame PTS: not set\n");
00862         }
00863         if (c->coded_frame->key_frame) {
00864             packet.flags |= AV_PKT_FLAG_KEY;
00865         }
00866         packet.stream_index = video_stream->index;
00867         packet.data = video_buffer;
00868         packet.size = outsize;
00869         ret = av_interleaved_write_frame(outfile, &packet);
00870         if (ret != 0) {
00871             fprintf(stderr, "Error writing delayed frame %d\n", ret);
00872             break;
00873         }
00874     }
00875     avcodec_flush_buffers(video_stream->codec);
00876 }
00877 
00878 /* **********************************************************************
00879  * * public interface
00880  * ********************************************************************** */
00881 
00882 /* Get the output filename-- similar to the other output formats */
00883 void filepath_ffmpeg(char* string, RenderData* rd)
00884 {
00885     char autosplit[20];
00886 
00887     const char ** exts = get_file_extensions(rd->ffcodecdata.type);
00888     const char ** fe = exts;
00889 
00890     if (!string || !exts) return;
00891 
00892     strcpy(string, rd->pic);
00893     BLI_path_abs(string, G.main->name);
00894 
00895     BLI_make_existing_file(string);
00896 
00897     autosplit[0] = 0;
00898 
00899     if ((rd->ffcodecdata.flags & FFMPEG_AUTOSPLIT_OUTPUT) != 0) {
00900         sprintf(autosplit, "_%03d", ffmpeg_autosplit_count);
00901     }
00902 
00903     while (*fe) {
00904         if (BLI_strcasecmp(string + strlen(string) - strlen(*fe), 
00905                    *fe) == 0) {
00906             break;
00907         }
00908         fe++;
00909     }
00910 
00911     if (!*fe) {
00912         strcat(string, autosplit);
00913 
00914         BLI_path_frame_range(string, rd->sfra, rd->efra, 4);
00915         strcat(string, *exts);
00916     }
00917     else {
00918         *(string + strlen(string) - strlen(*fe)) = 0;
00919         strcat(string, autosplit);
00920         strcat(string, *fe);
00921     }
00922 }
00923 
00924 int start_ffmpeg(struct Scene *scene, RenderData *rd, int rectx, int recty, ReportList *reports)
00925 {
00926     int success;
00927 
00928     ffmpeg_autosplit_count = 0;
00929 
00930     success = start_ffmpeg_impl(rd, rectx, recty, reports);
00931 #ifdef WITH_AUDASPACE
00932     if (audio_stream)
00933     {
00934         AVCodecContext* c = audio_stream->codec;
00935         AUD_DeviceSpecs specs;
00936         specs.channels = c->channels;
00937         specs.format = AUD_FORMAT_S16;
00938         specs.rate = rd->ffcodecdata.audio_mixrate;
00939         audio_mixdown_device = sound_mixdown(scene, specs, rd->sfra, rd->ffcodecdata.audio_volume);
00940 #ifdef FFMPEG_CODEC_TIME_BASE
00941         c->time_base.den = specs.rate;
00942         c->time_base.num = 1;
00943 #endif
00944     }
00945 #endif
00946     return success;
00947 }
00948 
00949 void end_ffmpeg(void);
00950 
00951 #ifdef WITH_AUDASPACE
00952 static void write_audio_frames(double to_pts)
00953 {
00954     int finished = 0;
00955 
00956     while (audio_stream && !finished) {
00957         if ((audio_time >= to_pts) ||
00958            (write_audio_frame())) {
00959             finished = 1;
00960         }
00961     }
00962 }
00963 #endif
00964 
00965 int append_ffmpeg(RenderData *rd, int start_frame, int frame, int *pixels, int rectx, int recty, ReportList *reports)
00966 {
00967     AVFrame* avframe;
00968     int success = 1;
00969 
00970     fprintf(stderr, "Writing frame %i, "
00971         "render width=%d, render height=%d\n", frame,
00972         rectx, recty);
00973 
00974 // why is this done before writing the video frame and again at end_ffmpeg?
00975 //  write_audio_frames(frame / (((double)rd->frs_sec) / rd->frs_sec_base));
00976 
00977     if (video_stream)
00978     {
00979         avframe= generate_video_frame((unsigned char*) pixels, reports);
00980         success= (avframe && write_video_frame(rd, frame - start_frame, avframe, reports));
00981 
00982         if (ffmpeg_autosplit) {
00983             if (avio_tell(outfile->pb) > FFMPEG_AUTOSPLIT_SIZE) {
00984                 end_ffmpeg();
00985                 ffmpeg_autosplit_count++;
00986                 success &= start_ffmpeg_impl(rd, rectx, recty, reports);
00987             }
00988         }
00989     }
00990 
00991 #ifdef WITH_AUDASPACE
00992     write_audio_frames((frame - rd->sfra) / (((double)rd->frs_sec) / rd->frs_sec_base));
00993 #endif
00994     return success;
00995 }
00996 
00997 void end_ffmpeg(void)
00998 {
00999     unsigned int i;
01000     
01001     fprintf(stderr, "Closing ffmpeg...\n");
01002 
01003 /*  if (audio_stream) { SEE UPPER
01004         write_audio_frames();
01005     }*/
01006 
01007 #ifdef WITH_AUDASPACE
01008     if (audio_mixdown_device) {
01009         AUD_closeReadDevice(audio_mixdown_device);
01010         audio_mixdown_device = 0;
01011     }
01012 #endif
01013 
01014     if (video_stream && video_stream->codec) {
01015         fprintf(stderr, "Flushing delayed frames...\n");
01016         flush_ffmpeg ();        
01017     }
01018     
01019     if (outfile) {
01020         av_write_trailer(outfile);
01021     }
01022     
01023     /* Close the video codec */
01024 
01025     if (video_stream && video_stream->codec) {
01026         avcodec_close(video_stream->codec);
01027         printf("zero video stream %p\n", video_stream);
01028         video_stream = 0;
01029     }
01030 
01031     
01032     /* Close the output file */
01033     if (outfile) {
01034         for (i = 0; i < outfile->nb_streams; i++) {
01035             if (&outfile->streams[i]) {
01036                 av_freep(&outfile->streams[i]);
01037             }
01038         }
01039     }
01040     /* free the temp buffer */
01041     if (current_frame) {
01042         delete_picture(current_frame);
01043         current_frame = 0;
01044     }
01045     if (outfile && outfile->oformat) {
01046         if (!(outfile->oformat->flags & AVFMT_NOFILE)) {
01047             avio_close(outfile->pb);
01048         }
01049     }
01050     if (outfile) {
01051         av_free(outfile);
01052         outfile = 0;
01053     }
01054     if (video_buffer) {
01055         MEM_freeN(video_buffer);
01056         video_buffer = 0;
01057     }
01058     if (audio_output_buffer) {
01059         av_free(audio_output_buffer);
01060         audio_output_buffer = 0;
01061     }
01062     if (audio_input_buffer) {
01063         av_free(audio_input_buffer);
01064         audio_input_buffer = 0;
01065     }
01066 
01067     if (img_convert_ctx) {
01068         sws_freeContext(img_convert_ctx);
01069         img_convert_ctx = 0;
01070     }
01071 }
01072 
01073 /* properties */
01074 
01075 void ffmpeg_property_del(RenderData *rd, void *type, void *prop_)
01076 {
01077     struct IDProperty *prop = (struct IDProperty *) prop_;
01078     IDProperty * group;
01079     
01080     if (!rd->ffcodecdata.properties) {
01081         return;
01082     }
01083 
01084     group = IDP_GetPropertyFromGroup(rd->ffcodecdata.properties, type);
01085     if (group && prop) {
01086         IDP_RemFromGroup(group, prop);
01087         IDP_FreeProperty(prop);
01088         MEM_freeN(prop);
01089     }
01090 }
01091 
01092 IDProperty *ffmpeg_property_add(RenderData *rd, const char *type, int opt_index, int parent_index)
01093 {
01094     AVCodecContext c;
01095     const AVOption * o;
01096     const AVOption * parent;
01097     IDProperty * group;
01098     IDProperty * prop;
01099     IDPropertyTemplate val;
01100     int idp_type;
01101     char name[256];
01102     
01103     val.i = 0;
01104 
01105     avcodec_get_context_defaults(&c);
01106 
01107     o = c.av_class->option + opt_index;
01108     parent = c.av_class->option + parent_index;
01109 
01110     if (!rd->ffcodecdata.properties) {
01111         rd->ffcodecdata.properties 
01112             = IDP_New(IDP_GROUP, &val, "ffmpeg"); 
01113     }
01114 
01115     group = IDP_GetPropertyFromGroup(rd->ffcodecdata.properties, type);
01116     
01117     if (!group) {
01118         group = IDP_New(IDP_GROUP, &val, type);
01119         IDP_AddToGroup(rd->ffcodecdata.properties, group);
01120     }
01121 
01122     if (parent_index) {
01123         BLI_snprintf(name, sizeof(name), "%s:%s", parent->name, o->name);
01124     }
01125     else {
01126         BLI_strncpy(name, o->name, sizeof(name));
01127     }
01128 
01129     fprintf(stderr, "ffmpeg_property_add: %s %d %d %s\n",
01130         type, parent_index, opt_index, name);
01131 
01132     prop = IDP_GetPropertyFromGroup(group, name);
01133     if (prop) {
01134         return prop;
01135     }
01136 
01137     switch (o->type) {
01138     case FF_OPT_TYPE_INT:
01139     case FF_OPT_TYPE_INT64:
01140         val.i = FFMPEG_DEF_OPT_VAL_INT(o);
01141         idp_type = IDP_INT;
01142         break;
01143     case FF_OPT_TYPE_DOUBLE:
01144     case FF_OPT_TYPE_FLOAT:
01145         val.f = FFMPEG_DEF_OPT_VAL_DOUBLE(o);
01146         idp_type = IDP_FLOAT;
01147         break;
01148     case FF_OPT_TYPE_STRING:
01149         val.string.str = (char *)"                                                                               ";
01150         val.string.len = 80;
01151 /*      val.str = (char *)"                                                                               ";*/
01152         idp_type = IDP_STRING;
01153         break;
01154     case FF_OPT_TYPE_CONST:
01155         val.i = 1;
01156         idp_type = IDP_INT;
01157         break;
01158     default:
01159         return NULL;
01160     }
01161     prop = IDP_New(idp_type, &val, name);
01162     IDP_AddToGroup(group, prop);
01163     return prop;
01164 }
01165 
01166 /* not all versions of ffmpeg include that, so here we go ... */
01167 
01168 static const AVOption *my_av_find_opt(void *v, const char *name,
01169                                       const char *unit, int mask, int flags)
01170 {
01171     AVClass *c= *(AVClass**)v; 
01172     const AVOption *o= c->option;
01173 
01174     for (;o && o->name; o++) {
01175         if (!strcmp(o->name, name) && 
01176            (!unit || (o->unit && !strcmp(o->unit, unit))) && 
01177            (o->flags & mask) == flags )
01178             return o;
01179     }
01180     return NULL;
01181 }
01182 
01183 int ffmpeg_property_add_string(RenderData *rd, const char * type, const char * str)
01184 {
01185     AVCodecContext c;
01186     const AVOption * o = 0;
01187     const AVOption * p = 0;
01188     char name_[128];
01189     char * name;
01190     char * param;
01191     IDProperty * prop;
01192     
01193     avcodec_get_context_defaults(&c);
01194 
01195     strncpy(name_, str, sizeof(name_));
01196 
01197     name = name_;
01198     while (*name == ' ') name++;
01199 
01200     param = strchr(name, ':');
01201 
01202     if (!param) {
01203         param = strchr(name, ' ');
01204     }
01205     if (param) {
01206         *param++ = 0;
01207         while (*param == ' ') param++;
01208     }
01209     
01210     o = my_av_find_opt(&c, name, NULL, 0, 0);   
01211     if (!o) {
01212         return 0;
01213     }
01214     if (param && o->type == FF_OPT_TYPE_CONST) {
01215         return 0;
01216     }
01217     if (param && o->type != FF_OPT_TYPE_CONST && o->unit) {
01218         p = my_av_find_opt(&c, param, o->unit, 0, 0);   
01219         prop = ffmpeg_property_add(rd,
01220             (char*) type, p - c.av_class->option, 
01221             o - c.av_class->option);
01222     }
01223     else {
01224         prop = ffmpeg_property_add(rd,
01225             (char*) type, o - c.av_class->option, 0);
01226     }
01227         
01228 
01229     if (!prop) {
01230         return 0;
01231     }
01232 
01233     if (param && !p) {
01234         switch (prop->type) {
01235         case IDP_INT:
01236             IDP_Int(prop) = atoi(param);
01237             break;
01238         case IDP_FLOAT:
01239             IDP_Float(prop) = atof(param);
01240             break;
01241         case IDP_STRING:
01242             strncpy(IDP_String(prop), param, prop->len);
01243             break;
01244         }
01245     }
01246     return 1;
01247 }
01248 
01249 static void ffmpeg_set_expert_options(RenderData *rd)
01250 {
01251     int codec_id = rd->ffcodecdata.codec;
01252 
01253     if (rd->ffcodecdata.properties)
01254         IDP_FreeProperty(rd->ffcodecdata.properties);
01255 
01256     if (codec_id == CODEC_ID_H264) {
01257         /*
01258          * All options here are for x264, but must be set via ffmpeg.
01259          * The names are therefore different - Search for "x264 to FFmpeg option mapping"
01260          * to get a list.
01261          */
01262 
01263         /*
01264          * Use CABAC coder. Using "coder:1", which should be equivalent,
01265          * crashes Blender for some reason. Either way - this is no big deal.
01266          */
01267         ffmpeg_property_add_string(rd, "video", "coder:vlc");
01268 
01269         /*
01270          * The other options were taken from the libx264-default.preset
01271          * included in the ffmpeg distribution.
01272          */
01273 //      ffmpeg_property_add_string(rd, "video", "flags:loop"); // this breaks compatibility for QT
01274         ffmpeg_property_add_string(rd, "video", "cmp:chroma");
01275         ffmpeg_property_add_string(rd, "video", "partitions:parti4x4");
01276         ffmpeg_property_add_string(rd, "video", "partitions:partp8x8");
01277         ffmpeg_property_add_string(rd, "video", "partitions:partb8x8");
01278         ffmpeg_property_add_string(rd, "video", "me:hex");
01279         ffmpeg_property_add_string(rd, "video", "subq:6");
01280         ffmpeg_property_add_string(rd, "video", "me_range:16");
01281         ffmpeg_property_add_string(rd, "video", "qdiff:4");
01282         ffmpeg_property_add_string(rd, "video", "keyint_min:25");
01283         ffmpeg_property_add_string(rd, "video", "sc_threshold:40");
01284         ffmpeg_property_add_string(rd, "video", "i_qfactor:0.71");
01285         ffmpeg_property_add_string(rd, "video", "b_strategy:1");
01286         ffmpeg_property_add_string(rd, "video", "bf:3");
01287         ffmpeg_property_add_string(rd, "video", "refs:2");
01288         ffmpeg_property_add_string(rd, "video", "qcomp:0.6");
01289         ffmpeg_property_add_string(rd, "video", "directpred:3");
01290         ffmpeg_property_add_string(rd, "video", "trellis:0");
01291         ffmpeg_property_add_string(rd, "video", "flags2:wpred");
01292         ffmpeg_property_add_string(rd, "video", "flags2:dct8x8");
01293         ffmpeg_property_add_string(rd, "video", "flags2:fastpskip");
01294         ffmpeg_property_add_string(rd, "video", "wpredp:2");
01295 
01296         if (rd->ffcodecdata.flags & FFMPEG_LOSSLESS_OUTPUT)
01297             ffmpeg_property_add_string(rd, "video", "cqp:0");
01298     }
01299 #if 0   /* disabled for after release */
01300     else if (codec_id == CODEC_ID_DNXHD) {
01301         if (rd->ffcodecdata.flags & FFMPEG_LOSSLESS_OUTPUT)
01302             ffmpeg_property_add_string(rd, "video", "mbd:rd");
01303     }
01304 #endif
01305 }
01306 
01307 void ffmpeg_set_preset(RenderData *rd, int preset)
01308 {
01309     int isntsc = (rd->frs_sec != 25);
01310 
01311     if (rd->ffcodecdata.properties)
01312         IDP_FreeProperty(rd->ffcodecdata.properties);
01313 
01314     switch (preset) {
01315     case FFMPEG_PRESET_VCD:
01316         rd->ffcodecdata.type = FFMPEG_MPEG1;
01317         rd->ffcodecdata.video_bitrate = 1150;
01318         rd->xsch = 352;
01319         rd->ysch = isntsc ? 240 : 288;
01320         rd->ffcodecdata.gop_size = isntsc ? 18 : 15;
01321         rd->ffcodecdata.rc_max_rate = 1150;
01322         rd->ffcodecdata.rc_min_rate = 1150;
01323         rd->ffcodecdata.rc_buffer_size = 40*8;
01324         rd->ffcodecdata.mux_packet_size = 2324;
01325         rd->ffcodecdata.mux_rate = 2352 * 75 * 8;
01326         break;
01327 
01328     case FFMPEG_PRESET_SVCD:
01329         rd->ffcodecdata.type = FFMPEG_MPEG2;
01330         rd->ffcodecdata.video_bitrate = 2040;
01331         rd->xsch = 480;
01332         rd->ysch = isntsc ? 480 : 576;
01333         rd->ffcodecdata.gop_size = isntsc ? 18 : 15;
01334         rd->ffcodecdata.rc_max_rate = 2516;
01335         rd->ffcodecdata.rc_min_rate = 0;
01336         rd->ffcodecdata.rc_buffer_size = 224*8;
01337         rd->ffcodecdata.mux_packet_size = 2324;
01338         rd->ffcodecdata.mux_rate = 0;
01339         break;
01340 
01341     case FFMPEG_PRESET_DVD:
01342         rd->ffcodecdata.type = FFMPEG_MPEG2;
01343         rd->ffcodecdata.video_bitrate = 6000;
01344 
01345         /* Don't set resolution, see [#21351]
01346          * rd->xsch = 720;
01347          * rd->ysch = isntsc ? 480 : 576; */
01348 
01349         rd->ffcodecdata.gop_size = isntsc ? 18 : 15;
01350         rd->ffcodecdata.rc_max_rate = 9000;
01351         rd->ffcodecdata.rc_min_rate = 0;
01352         rd->ffcodecdata.rc_buffer_size = 224*8;
01353         rd->ffcodecdata.mux_packet_size = 2048;
01354         rd->ffcodecdata.mux_rate = 10080000;
01355         break;
01356 
01357     case FFMPEG_PRESET_DV:
01358         rd->ffcodecdata.type = FFMPEG_DV;
01359         rd->xsch = 720;
01360         rd->ysch = isntsc ? 480 : 576;
01361         break;
01362 
01363     case FFMPEG_PRESET_H264:
01364         rd->ffcodecdata.type = FFMPEG_AVI;
01365         rd->ffcodecdata.codec = CODEC_ID_H264;
01366         rd->ffcodecdata.video_bitrate = 6000;
01367         rd->ffcodecdata.gop_size = isntsc ? 18 : 15;
01368         rd->ffcodecdata.rc_max_rate = 9000;
01369         rd->ffcodecdata.rc_min_rate = 0;
01370         rd->ffcodecdata.rc_buffer_size = 224*8;
01371         rd->ffcodecdata.mux_packet_size = 2048;
01372         rd->ffcodecdata.mux_rate = 10080000;
01373 
01374         break;
01375 
01376     case FFMPEG_PRESET_THEORA:
01377     case FFMPEG_PRESET_XVID:
01378         if (preset == FFMPEG_PRESET_XVID) {
01379             rd->ffcodecdata.type = FFMPEG_AVI;
01380             rd->ffcodecdata.codec = CODEC_ID_MPEG4;
01381         }
01382         else if (preset == FFMPEG_PRESET_THEORA) {
01383             rd->ffcodecdata.type = FFMPEG_OGG; // XXX broken
01384             rd->ffcodecdata.codec = CODEC_ID_THEORA;
01385         }
01386 
01387         rd->ffcodecdata.video_bitrate = 6000;
01388         rd->ffcodecdata.gop_size = isntsc ? 18 : 15;
01389         rd->ffcodecdata.rc_max_rate = 9000;
01390         rd->ffcodecdata.rc_min_rate = 0;
01391         rd->ffcodecdata.rc_buffer_size = 224*8;
01392         rd->ffcodecdata.mux_packet_size = 2048;
01393         rd->ffcodecdata.mux_rate = 10080000;
01394         break;
01395 
01396     }
01397 
01398     ffmpeg_set_expert_options(rd);
01399 }
01400 
01401 void ffmpeg_verify_image_type(RenderData *rd, ImageFormatData *imf)
01402 {
01403     int audio= 0;
01404 
01405     if (imf->imtype == R_IMF_IMTYPE_FFMPEG) {
01406         if (rd->ffcodecdata.type <= 0 ||
01407            rd->ffcodecdata.codec <= 0 ||
01408            rd->ffcodecdata.audio_codec <= 0 ||
01409            rd->ffcodecdata.video_bitrate <= 1) {
01410 
01411             rd->ffcodecdata.codec = CODEC_ID_MPEG2VIDEO;
01412 
01413             ffmpeg_set_preset(rd, FFMPEG_PRESET_DVD);
01414         }
01415         if (rd->ffcodecdata.type == FFMPEG_OGG) {
01416             rd->ffcodecdata.type = FFMPEG_MPEG2;
01417         }
01418 
01419         audio= 1;
01420     }
01421     else if (imf->imtype == R_IMF_IMTYPE_H264) {
01422         if (rd->ffcodecdata.codec != CODEC_ID_H264) {
01423             ffmpeg_set_preset(rd, FFMPEG_PRESET_H264);
01424             audio= 1;
01425         }
01426     }
01427     else if (imf->imtype == R_IMF_IMTYPE_XVID) {
01428         if (rd->ffcodecdata.codec != CODEC_ID_MPEG4) {
01429             ffmpeg_set_preset(rd, FFMPEG_PRESET_XVID);
01430             audio= 1;
01431         }
01432     }
01433     else if (imf->imtype == R_IMF_IMTYPE_THEORA) {
01434         if (rd->ffcodecdata.codec != CODEC_ID_THEORA) {
01435             ffmpeg_set_preset(rd, FFMPEG_PRESET_THEORA);
01436             audio= 1;
01437         }
01438     }
01439 
01440     if (audio && rd->ffcodecdata.audio_codec < 0) {
01441         rd->ffcodecdata.audio_codec = CODEC_ID_NONE;
01442         rd->ffcodecdata.audio_bitrate = 128;
01443     }
01444 }
01445 
01446 void ffmpeg_verify_codec_settings(RenderData *rd)
01447 {
01448     ffmpeg_set_expert_options(rd);
01449 }
01450 
01451 int ffmpeg_alpha_channel_supported(RenderData *rd)
01452 {
01453     int codec = rd->ffcodecdata.codec;
01454 
01455     if (codec == CODEC_ID_QTRLE)
01456         return TRUE;
01457 
01458 #ifdef FFMPEG_FFV1_ALPHA_SUPPORTED
01459     if (codec == CODEC_ID_FFV1)
01460         return TRUE;
01461 #endif
01462 
01463     return FALSE;
01464 }
01465 
01466 #endif
